name: Google Maps business scraper with contact extraction via Apify and Firecrawl

parameters.content:
## üöÄ INITIALIZATION PHASE
- Triggers every 30 minutes
- Reads unprocessed records from [Google Sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DHezdcetT0c3Ie1xB3z3jDc5WElsLN87K4J9EQDef9g/edit?usp=sharing)
- Starts Google Places scraper for restaurants
- Waits for completion

## üìä DATA COLLECTION PHASE
- Monitors scraper job status
- Loops until job completes
- Fetches scraped restaurant data
- Saves to "Data" sheet in [Google Sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DHezdcetT0c3Ie1xB3z3jDc5WElsLN87K4J9EQDef9g/edit?usp=sharing)

## üåê WEBSITE PROCESSING PHASE
- Filters restaurants with valid websites
- Loops through each website
- Scrapes website content with Firecrawl
- Extracts contact information (emails, social media)
- Saves to "Details" sheet and marks as processed

## üîÑ LOOPS
**Status Check Loop**: Continues until scraper job is complete
**Website Processing Loop**: Processes each restaurant website individually

json.col_8: You can make a copy of this sheet and use your google sheet - if you need help you can reach out to nchoudhary110792@gmail.com
